example.question: What are you currently worried about?
example.description: You cannot use the $out or the $merge stage in conjunction with read concern linearizable. That is, if you specify linearizable read concern for db.collection.aggregate(), you cannot include either stages in the pipeline. The following operation on a replica s specifies a Read Concern of majority to read the most recent copy of the data confirmed as having been written to a majority of the nodes.
